bug.author: tomginsberg
bug.summary: Error 3143: Invalid JSON path expression. The error is around character position 62.
bug.description:
wandb, version 0.8.15 Python 3.7.4 Mac OS Darwin <denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I logged several runs in a project that appear to have some errors in them (I'm really not sure what specifically). But now when I view project runs I get the error message <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10860163/68805661-8d93ee80-0664-11ea-8888-21a7b7237adb.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
There's nothing that I can really do besides log more runs and only open them from the home page. I cannot delete the faulty runs, so it has practically corrupted my whole project.
